name: Ghosty
description:
Get ready for a crazy Five Player Ghost Game!
First Player starts the server as the Ghost by pressing Start Server. Other players join in by pressing Refresh Hosts, and then selecting the The Ghost Room. Once all players are connected, Player One may press the Start Game button (but don't press it before all other players are connected!):

Player One is the Ghost. Use the Space Bar to control your invisibility! Hold it down to become visible again and get a burst of speed! Hunt down all of the other players and take them down by touching them.

Other players use the Space Bar to fend off the ghost with their flashlights! But watch out, your flashlight runs out of battery over time! You'll get a warning when the Ghosty is close... OH GOD HE'S COMING

All players can use Use WASD or Arrows to move.
